featured.text: People may choose a name because they are strongly 38 a character in a book or a television series; they may also adopt names of famous people or their favorite actors and actresses.

definition.zh_def: 女演員，指在戲劇、電影或電視劇中表演的女性。
definition.en_def: A female performer in plays, movies, or television shows.
definition.example: The actress received an award for her outstanding performance in the film.
